languages.text: "Мы спрашивали его много раз, потому что не хотели навредить. Номос не стали бы даже предлагать такое, если б человек был против".
"We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."
languages.original_text: "Мы спрашивали его много раз, потому что не хотели навредить. Номос не стали бы даже предлагать такое, если б человек был против".

traits.locale_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."
"We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."
"We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."
"We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."
"We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

languages.text: 「我々は彼に何度も頼んだ。彼を傷つけたくなかったから。もし人類が反対していたら、ノモスはそれを提案しなかった」
languages.original_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は彼に何度も頼んだ。彼を傷つけたくなかったから。もし人類が反対していたら、ノモスはそれを提案しなかった」

languages.text: “我们问过他很多次，因为我们并不想伤害他。如果这个人类反对，诺莫斯是不会提出这个建议的。”
languages.original_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

traits.locale_text: “我们问过他很多次，因为我们并不想伤害他。如果这个人类反对，诺莫斯是不会提出这个建议的。”

languages.text: "Wir haben ihn oft gefragt, weil wir ihn nicht verletzen wollten. Nomos hätten es nicht vorgeschlagen, wenn der Mensch dagegen gewesen wäre."
languages.original_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben ihn oft gefragt, weil wir ihn nicht verletzen wollten. Nomos hätten es nicht vorgeschlagen, wenn der Mensch dagegen gewesen wäre."

languages.text: « Nous lui avons posé cette question à plusieurs reprises, car nous ne lui voulons aucun mal. Nous n'aurions pas fait cette proposition s'il s'y était opposé. »
languages.original_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

traits.locale_text: « Nous lui avons posé cette question à plusieurs reprises, car nous ne lui voulons aucun mal. Nous n'aurions pas fait cette proposition s'il s'y était opposé. »

languages.text: «Se lo pedimos en numerosas ocasiones porque no queríamos lastimarlo. Nomos no lo habría propuesto si el humano se opusiera a ello».
languages.original_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

traits.locale_text: «Se lo pedimos en numerosas ocasiones porque no queríamos lastimarlo. Nomos no lo habría propuesto si el humano se opusiera a ello».

languages.text: "Onu incitmek istemediğimizden defalarca sorduk. İnsanın rızası olmasaydı Nomos bunu teklif etmezdi."
languages.original_text: "We asked him many times because we did not want to hurt him. Nomos would not have proposed it if the human was against it."

traits.locale_text: "Ona defalarca sorduk çünkü onu incitmek istemedik. İnsanın rızası olmasaydı Nomos bunu teklif etmezdi."
